sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"重新获得，重新找到，恢复"之意。
means: recover ： 普通用词，含义广，可泛指收回去的物质的或精神的东西，也指无意中找到失物。
reclaim ： 主要指回收或利用废物。
restore ： 指建筑物、工艺品恢复原状，也指健康、能力等的恢复。
regain ： 着重指通过努力使失去的东西复得。

sentence.Network_en: She needs to regain a sense of her own worth.
sentence.Network_cn: 她需要重新认识到自我的价值。

sentence.Network_en: I'll have to take stock, go carefully and regain my buoyancy.
sentence.Network_cn: 我将不得不审时度势，小心行事，同时保持乐观。

sentence.Network_en: The fighter believes he can still regain some of his old magic.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位斗士相信自己仍然可以恢复从前的一些魔力。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French regagner (see re-, gain)

entry.tran: 恢复；失而复得；重新得到
entry.def: If you regain something that you have lost, you get it back again.

example.ex: Troops have regained control of the city...
It took him a while to regain his composure.
example.tran: 他过了一会儿才恢复镇定。

entry.def: If you regain a place that you have left, you succeed in getting back there.

example.ex: Davis went to regain his carriage.
example.tran: 戴维斯回到他的马车上。

means.word_mean: 1. get or find back; recover the use of;

sentences.sentence: "She found her voice and replied quickly"

means.word_mean: 2. come upon after searching; find the location of something that was missed or lost;

auth_sentence.content: Only then will he regain the fans' trust.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only then will he regain the fans' trust.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only then will he regain the fans' trust.

auth_sentence.content: What must the UN do to regain your trust?
auth_sentence.res_content: What must the UN do to regain your trust?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What must the UN do to regain your trust?

auth_sentence.content: It takes intensive training to regain control of the hand.
auth_sentence.res_content: It takes intensive training to regain control of the hand.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It takes intensive training to regain control of the hand.

Sentence.sentence: American business will regain its shine.
Milkman says, "that these extracurricular jobs were an effort on the part of the workers to regain their dignity after suffering the degradation of repetitive assembly line work in the factory.
In Ruth Milkman's opinion, many assembly line workers did home renovation and other skilled work in their off-hours in order to regain their dignity

sentences.en: Shall we regain the shore alive?
sentences.cn: 我们能活着回到岸上吗?
